title: Getting bugsplats when I ALT + TAB
body:
My pc is pretty weak, but this starting happening in this patch. 
I can't even quickly join the match again because of the scanning archives

PD: Alt tab to play a song in windows media, like not even chrome opened.

replies.body: If that only happens when you alt+tab, I would honestly try to get everything setup in the background so that you don't need to switch windows mid-game anymore. You could also switch the display to windowed so the program doesn't actually have to try and suspend itself when you switch windows, that may be your best bet actually.
Actually being careful with that, so I try windowed and the fps are less but nice idea
That's fine if the FPS dropped, I want to focus on preventing those crashes first then we can deal with upping your FPS. Were you crashing in windowed or no?
In fullscreen. Im sending a ticket with a r3dlog :3
